data.title: FLEFF 25th Anniversary: Best of the Fest Announced!
data.meta_description: Did you miss out on some of the virtual offerings from this year’s Finger Lakes Environmental Film Festival? Fear not! Starting Monday, April 11, you’ll have one week to catch the BEST OF THE FEST - PROGRAMMER’S PICKS. Festival organizers have hand-picked their seven favorites from the 25th Anniversary edition of the Finger Lakes Environmental Film Festival. You can access all seven film on the FLEFF/Cinemapolis Eventive platform, HERE. Best of the Fest Films: Blanco en Blanco (Chile) Devil Put Coal in the Ground  (US) Nationtime: Gary (US) Neptune's Frost (Rwanda) No Desire to Hide (China/US) The Golden Harvest (Palestine/Greece/United Arab Emirates) The Hill Where the Lionesses Roar (Kosovo/France) FLEFF: A DIFFERENT ENVIRONMENT
data.text:
Starting Monday, April 11, you’ll have one week to catch the BEST OF THE FEST - PROGRAMMER’S PICKS. Festival organizers have hand-picked their seven favorites from the 25th Anniversary edition of the Finger Lakes Environmental Film Festival.

You can access all seven film on the FLEFF/Cinemapolis Eventive platform, HERE.

Best of the Fest Films:

Blanco en Blanco (Chile)

Devil Put Coal in the Ground (US)

Nationtime: Gary (US)

Neptune's Frost (Rwanda)

No Desire to Hide (China/US)

The Golden Harvest (Palestine/Greece/United Arab Emirates)

The Hill Where the Lionesses Roar (Kosovo/France)
